CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Bill_From_City__c ), Bill_From_State__c + ' ' + Bill_From_Zip__c , IF(AND(ISBLANK(Bill_From_State__c ),ISBLANK(Bill_From_Zip__c )), Bill_From_City__c , Bill_From_City__c +','+ ' ' + Bill_From_State__c + ' ' + Bill_From_Zip__c ))
CustomField.label: Bill From Id Address
